text: Safety hazard experience üò≠ Found hard plastic pieces in the pizza!! Ordered online and had a shock when I bit through something hard while eating the pizza. Found some hard plastic within the pizza itself. What if my kid was the one eating the pizza and swallowed it? Very dangerous. I expected better quality and standard from an established restaurant. Disappointing.

Amazing experience here
Had an issue with my order, but the manager handled it excellently and was calm and composed.
Looking forward to becoming a pizza hut diehard fan soon for their service

It wasn't really delivery only. There is take-away option available here as well. I ordered on $3 take-away pizza - chicky ham and corn. It was on 50% disc for take-away. Good price and it was still hot and yummy.

Took about 15 minutes to get the order ready. There is one seat inside for two pax.

Preferably order through the app prior for take-away. Mostly about 15-20 minutes to get the order ready to collect.

Few delivery platform drivers collecting their order here.

1.Both 2 large pizzas are wet and  dough not cooked!
Pic 1-3

2.The Pizzas that I had ordered came smashed!
Pic 4-5
